list.title: Quote List

new.description: Upload vendor quote documents and record quote information

project.label: Project
project.hint: Can only upload quotes for projects with approved proposals

file.label: Quote Document
file.hint: Supported formats: PDF, Word (.doc, .docx), Excel (.xls, .xlsx), max 10MB

uploadNotice.title: Upload Notice
uploadNotice.approvedOnly: Can only upload quotes for projects with approved proposals
uploadNotice.contentQuality: Please ensure quote document content is complete and clear
uploadNotice.comparison: After upload, you can view and select from the quote comparison page

validation.invalidFileType: Unsupported file type. Please upload PDF, Word or Excel files.
validation.amountRequired: Please enter a valid quote amount
validation.fileRequired: Please select a file to upload

messages.notFound: Quote not found. This quote may not exist or has been deleted.
messages.hasRelatedPO: This quote has been selected for a purchase order and cannot be modified.
messages.cannotModify: Project, vendor, and quote file cannot be modified. To change these, please delete this quote and upload a new one.

empty.title: No purchase orders

toast.minOneItem: At least one item is required

dialogs.approveDesc: After approval, the purchase order status will be updated to 'Approved'.
dialogs.approveWarning: Approval cannot be undone. Please confirm the purchase information is correct.

requiresChargeOut.description: Check this if this expense needs to be deducted from the project budget pool

isOperationMaint.description: Check this if this is an operation and maintenance expense

validation.atLeastOneItem: At least one expense item is required
validation.itemNameRequired: Please fill in all required information (name, amount)

actions.submitConfirmDesc:
Once submitted, the expense record will enter the approval workflow.
You cannot edit after submission. Please confirm all information is correct.
actions.approveConfirmDesc:
Once approved, the status will be updated to "Approved".
This action cannot be undone. Please verify all information is correct.
actions.needItems: Please add at least one expense item before submitting

validation.noItems: Cannot submit. At least one expense item is required
